          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy from trees</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie von den Bäumen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie des arbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia das árvores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia proveniente dagli alberi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια από τα δέντρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía de árboles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a tree that stores energy from the Sun. Wood, in turn, can be burned for fuel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wood</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Baum, der Energie vom
Sonne-Holz kann für Kraftstoff der Reihe nach gebrannt werden 
speichert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un arbre qui enregistre
l'énergie du bois du soleil, alternativement, peut être brûlé pour
le carburant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma árvore que armazene
a energia da madeira do sol, por sua vez, possa ser queimada para o 
combustível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un albero che 
memorizza l'energia proveniente dal legno del sole, a loro volta, può
essere bruciato per combustibile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα δέντρο ότι η 
ενέργεια καταστημάτων από το ξύλο ήλιων, στη συνέχεια, μπορεί 
να καεί για τα καύσιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un árbol que salve 
energía de la madera del sol, alternadamente, se pueda quemar para el
combustible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
